title: #204 - Kurt Metzger & ME
description: Comedian Kurt Metzger and I hang out NY and talk about comics & Political Correctness,his thoughts on pigeons, his Facebook beef with feminists, Barry Crimmins, writing for Amy Schumer & Patrice, & partying with Greg Giraldo.
